subject: Horse Racing
Santa Anita Derby
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Dortmund won the $400,000 San Felipe Stakes in Arcadia, Calif., by one and a quarter lengths to improve to 5-0 and solidify his status as a threat for the Kentucky Derby.
snippet: Dortmund won the $400,000 San Felipe Stakes in Arcadia, Calif., by one and a quarter lengths to improve to 5-0 and solidify his status as a threat for the Kentucky Derby.
